name: 7 Days
storyline:
After one too many puffs, the protagonist finds himself lost in a dreamlike realm, reliving fragments of his past and confronting the traumas and regrets that haunt him.
Each day, the player is faced with a choice: will they encourage the protagonist to confront and accept his traumas, or will they let him dwell in the past? The fate of the game hangs in the balance, as the player's decisions shape the narrative and ultimately determine the ending.
summary:
Step into a world where dreams and reality mix.
Play as a boy trapped between waking life and a dream, exploring his memories each day. Each day reveals a new part of his life, from school and family to love and loss. Your choices will determine if he finds hope and wakes up or falls into darkness. Experience unique environments, calming music, and an emotional story in this immersive adventure.
